modpacks.name: Dimserenes-Modpack
modpacks.description:
A full-featured modpack including as many mods as possible.
Talisman branch is available for Talisman mod and mods that depend on it.

modpacks.name: Fine-tuned-Pack
modpacks.description: A carefully crafted modpack for an optimized gameplay experience.

modpacks.name: Vanilla-Plus-Pack
modpacks.description: Enhances the core game with small improvements while staying true to the original experience.

modpacks.name: Cruel-Pack
modpacks.description: A harsh and unforgiving modpack for experienced players.

modpacks.name: Experimental-Pack
modpacks.description: Contains relatively new and experimental mods, for fresh new features and concepts.

modpacks.name: OT5Modpack
modpacks.description:
A modpack made by Jenwalter666.
Disclaimer: This modpack is meant to be played by itself and is best to not mix with other modpacks.

hints: Tip: Switch between Light and Dark theme in Settings.
Tip: Lovely Injector is required for modded gameplay!
Tip: Right-click a mod to open its links menu.
Tip: Click 'I Feel Lucky' to randomly select mods!
Tip: Backup your Mods folder before install modpack.
Tip: Drag and drop custom mods into the Mod Manager!
Tip: Hover over mods to see their descriptions.
Tip: Join the Discord for help and updates!
Tip: 'Check Versions' to see if modpack is outdated!
Tip: Modpacks auto-update every day at 00:00 UTC.
Tip: Disable title's rainbow effect in Settings!
Tip: Uninstalling a modpack wipes the Mods folder!
Tip: Set a custom game executable in Settings.
Tip: Click 'Refresh' if modpack info looks outdated.
Tip: 'Steamodded' will be auto-installed!
Tip: Mod dependencies are handled automatically!
Tip: 'Quick Update' may not always work correctly.
Tip: Edit 'user_settings.json' for further customization.
Tip: Save and load mods presets in the install screen.
Tip: Drag and drop archive files to auto-extract them!
Tip: Mods with dependencies auto-select required mods.
Tip: Manager auto-updates every time you launch!
Tip: Game issues? Try updating Lovely Injector.
Tip: Use search bar in mod selection to search mods!
Tip: Click me to display more useful hints!
Tip: New 'Cosmetic Addon'!
Tip: Submit an issue in bug tracker if you have ideas!
Tip: Modpacks are stored alonside Mods folder!
Tip: Settings are stored alonside Mods folder!
